sentences.english: Years of faithful exercise and wearing a jogging bra had kept her body tone firm.
sentences.chinese: 多年堅持鍛鍊並戴着慢跑乳罩使她的身體十分健康。
乳罩爲什麼是單數，而內褲是複數。

sentences.english: A half-cup bra style with wide-set straps and a horizontal bust line.
sentences.chinese: 這款半杯乳罩有水平的胸帶，而且比較寬。

sentences.english: It is commonly assumed that a belly dancing bra size is the same as normal bra size.
sentences.chinese: 一般認爲，肚皮舞乳罩與普通類型大小一致。

sentences.english: Many Sport bras use the racerback.
sentences.chinese: 許多運動式乳罩就採用泳賽式設計。

sentences.english: How do they envision the extra-large ladies who will wear the bras on the other side of the earth?
sentences.chinese: 她們會如何想在地球另一端戴這件乳罩的女巨人？

sentences.english: She want to buy an uplift bra.
sentences.chinese: 她想買一個挺高式乳罩。

sentences.english: This type of bra is intended for backless and strapless fashions.
sentences.chinese: 此款乳罩適用於露背和無肩式時裝。

sentences.english: The best known brand of push-up bra is the Wonderbra.
sentences.chinese: 託舉式乳罩最知名的品牌是Wonderbra。

sentences.english: In some cases these may easily be removed, if desired.
sentences.chinese: 某些款中，內置乳罩如果需要可以輕易移除。

definition: undergarment covering the chest and abdomen
